bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names yan zhong chi mai 眼 中赤脈 ; mu sheng chi mai 目生赤脈 , the eyes grow red vessels. Pathological Condition identical with fei xue 飛血 , flying blood. Kai bao xin xiang ding ben cao 開 寶 新 詳 定 本 草 Kai bao chong ding ben cao 開寶重定本草 Substance Entry mi meng hua 蜜蒙 花：主青盲膚翳，赤澀多眵淚，消目中赤脈 , “It controls green blindness and skin shade, with redness, roughness and profuse tearflow, and it dissolves red vessels in the eye ”.
